mods.abstract: Male adult, Moro man doll, composition head covered with fabric, wire supported arms and limbs, molded and painted features, black wig, red head band, yellow satin jacket with bead buttons, red satin pants tapered down at ankles, green striped sash tied with big knife, standing on round wooden-plate. Accompanying information describes as a dancer and fighter of the Philippines. Designed and made in the Philippines, 1850s. Doll body is machine-made. Costume, hand and machine-made.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
